channel.title: !614 Commands And Adding Barrage!
channel.description:
Base is not dragonkk its emberscape.
Need to know how to remove admin only for doing "`" or so normal players can do more commands because atm they can only do ::item but i also need to add so they can do master but only admins can do atm
Or if you know how to add ice barrage on dragonkk please let me know or link me to a tut.
thanks

item.title: !614 Commands And Adding Barrage!
item.dc:creator: @Rigsy Rigsy
item.description:
@Rigsy wrote:

[quote=“Ecstacy Pkz, post:4, topic:363317”]Here’s how to make commands require ::
Open packets.java and search for Chat
You’ll see something like this:

/* * Chat */ @SuppressWarnings("unused") private static void PacketId_25(InStream Packet, int Size, Player p) {

Replace your Enitre Chat Method With This:

[code] /*
* Chat
*/
@SuppressWarnings(“unused”)
private static void PacketId_25(InStream Packet, int Size, Player p) {

	int effects = Packet.readUnsignedShort();
	int numChars = Packet.readUnsignedByte();
	if(numChars > 100 || numChars < 0 || effects < 0)
		return;
	String text = Misc.decryptPlayerChat(Packet, numChars);
	if(text.startsWith("::") || text.startsWith(">>")) {
		handleCommand(text, p);
		return;
	}
	if(p.isMuted() && p.getRights() < 2) {
		p.getFrames().sendChatMessage(0, "You are muted and cannot talk.");
		return;
	}
	if(text == null || text.equals(""))
		return;
	StringBuilder newText = new StringBuilder();
	boolean wasSpace = true;
	for (int i = 0; i < text.length(); i++) {
		if (wasSpace) {
			newText.append(("" + text.charAt(i)).toUpperCase());
			if (!String.valueOf(text.charAt(i)).equals(" "))
				wasSpace = false;
		} else
			newText.append(("" + text.charAt(i)).toLowerCase());
		if (String.valueOf(text.charAt(i)).contains(".")
				|| String.valueOf(text.charAt(i)).contains("!")
				|| String.valueOf(text.charAt(i)).contains("?"))
			wasSpace = true;
	}
	text = newText.toString();
	p.getMask()
			.setLastChatMessage(new ChatMessage(effects, numChars, text));
	p.getMask().setChatUpdate(true);
}

public static void handleCommand(String command, Player p) {
	command = command.replaceAll("::", "");
	String[] cmd = command.split(" ");
	CommandManager.execute(cmd, p);
	
}

[/code][/quote]

Thanks you screwed up my compile now asshole.

Read full topic

item.title: !614 Commands And Adding Barrage!
item.dc:creator: @Ecstacy_Pkz Ecstacy Pkz
item.description:
@Ecstacy_Pkz wrote:

Here’s how to make commands require ::
Open packets.java and search for Chat
You’ll see something like this:

/* * Chat */ @SuppressWarnings("unused") private static void PacketId_25(InStream Packet, int Size, Player p) {

Replace your Enitre Chat Method With This:

[code] /*
* Chat
*/
@SuppressWarnings(“unused”)
private static void PacketId_25(InStream Packet, int Size, Player p) {

	int effects = Packet.readUnsignedShort();
	int numChars = Packet.readUnsignedByte();
	if(numChars > 100 || numChars < 0 || effects < 0)
		return;
	String text = Misc.decryptPlayerChat(Packet, numChars);
	if(text.startsWith("::") || text.startsWith(">>")) {
		handleCommand(text, p);
		return;
	}
	if(p.isMuted() && p.getRights() < 2) {
		p.getFrames().sendChatMessage(0, "You are muted and cannot talk.");
		return;
	}
	if(text == null || text.equals(""))
		return;
	StringBuilder newText = new StringBuilder();
	boolean wasSpace = true;
	for (int i = 0; i < text.length(); i++) {
		if (wasSpace) {
			newText.append(("" + text.charAt(i)).toUpperCase());
			if (!String.valueOf(text.charAt(i)).equals(" "))
				wasSpace = false;
		} else
			newText.append(("" + text.charAt(i)).toLowerCase());
		if (String.valueOf(text.charAt(i)).contains(".")
				|| String.valueOf(text.charAt(i)).contains("!")
				|| String.valueOf(text.charAt(i)).contains("?"))
			wasSpace = true;
	}
	text = newText.toString();
	p.getMask()
			.setLastChatMessage(new ChatMessage(effects, numChars, text));
	p.getMask().setChatUpdate(true);
}

public static void handleCommand(String command, Player p) {
	command = command.replaceAll("::", "");
	String[] cmd = command.split(" ");
	CommandManager.execute(cmd, p);
	
}

[/code]

item.title: !614 Commands And Adding Barrage!
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

If I am correct it should be in the client, so base should matter little.

The server sends a packet upon login telling your playerRights and the client interprets that to let you use the panel, or not.

However i’m not aware too much about how the client works, so thats all I can say.
